content: the **lovely hearts bamboo baby blanket** 1 is designed with a cute and simple lace pattern with hearts and is framed by a pretty edge with bubbles and picot it s crocheted in rainbow bamboo which is made from 100% natural materials 60% viscose from bamboo and 40% cotton bamboo fibers is a sustainable material absorbs moisture and is said to have antibacterial properties they re very strong and add extra durability to the yarn it s both breathable and temperature regulating perfect for a baby the yarn also adds a nice weight to the blanket which also makes the blanket drape beautifully have fun **materials ** recommended crochet hook 3 mm rainbow bamboo **crochet gauge ** 20 stitches x 11 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm **measurements ** approx 82 x 80 cm 32 x 31 5 without edge approx 91 x 89 cm 36 x 35 with edge yarn usage approx 6 skeins 575 g **abbreviations ** chain chain stitch s stitch double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch bs bobble stitch bp-half_double_crochet back post half_double_crochet stitch 1 https //hobbii com/lovely-hearts-bamboo-baby-blanket utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=lovely-hearts-bamboo-baby-blanket+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
